K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-1: da yam n'a ma dha ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-3: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-7: bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi skyed mos tshal na sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi shing ljon pa kun nas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-8: lha'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-10: dka' thub bzang po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-12: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shing dang bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa phyi ma'i dus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-16: kun tu rjes su gzung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-17: khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-19: chos thams cad dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-20: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams rnam pa thams cad du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13a-22: de khyed kyis zungs la da ltar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-0: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas phyi ma'i dus na theg pa chen po la yang @13b dag par zhugs pa'i 'khor rnam pa bzhi rnams la ston cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-2: yal bar mi dor bar nges par bstan par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-4: ji tsam du phongs par gyur pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-5: sgrib pa dang ldan pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bskyang zhing nges par bstan par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin 'di nan tan gyis yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-14: sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-18: sarba a'a k'a ra aartha pa ri pr'apte /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-19: aa sa manta sarba ku na a'a k'a re trya dhve /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-20: aa sam ga aa n'a pri ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-21: sa manta da sha de sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-23: sarba aa sam ga darsha na pr'apte /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-24: sarba dharma ma bi sha ta pa ri p'urne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-26: aa sam ga sa ma ni te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-27: sa mant'a aa th'a ti ha ta dzetrya dhva da sha su /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-33: bi mo ksha aa nu pr'apte /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-34: su pra ti buddha dha rm'a dh'a tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-35: aa tyanta su ni sri te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-36: sarba a'a k'a ra ni sa sa r'a na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-37: aa na pa she sha p'a rang te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-39: aa sam yo ga bi pra yo ga sthi te dharma te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-41: pra kri ti pa ri shuddha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:13b-44: trya dhva aa nu ga ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-0: ma dhya trya dhva sa manta aa @14a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-3: pa ri dzny'a pra ha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-5: sa ksh'ad kri ya par ma pa rang+ga te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-6: ya th'a b'a di ta th'a k'a ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-7: sarba a'a k'a ra sam panne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-8: sarba a'a k'a ra ma h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-9: mee tri mah'a ka ru n'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-10: srba a'a k'a r'a sa mas gra ha aa nu pr'apte /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-12: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-13: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 'khor bzhi po las rigs kyi bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-14: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis lus la thogs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-15: legs par kha ton du byas te 'dzin pa des dman pa'i sems su mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag gi spyi gtsug gi steng gi mtshams su gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-17: kha cig ni nges par sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-19: kha cig ni chos ston par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-20: kha cig ni gzungs mi brjed par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-21: slob pa lam la gnas pa rnams ni lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad cing chos ston pa rgyun mi chad par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-22: kun tu 'dzin pa mi brjed par yang 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-23: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grub par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-24: de dag dang ldan na thos pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gzungs thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-25: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14a-26: yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du rjes su thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-0: @14b khyed kyis tshe 'di la nga'i bstan pa'i dgongs pa khong du chud par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-2: rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang nges par bstan par bya zhing bsgrag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-8: de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-10: sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di slad ma'i dus na 'khor bzhi rnams la phyi bshol ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-11: mi bskyud par bstan par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-14: rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang nges par bstan par bgyi zhing bsgrag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-15: des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung dang mthun par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-16: bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-18: rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang don chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-19: phan pa'i dngos po chen por 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-22: de'i phyir ji skad smras pa de bzhin gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-23: 'di ni khyed la rjes su bstan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-26: dka' thub bzang po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:14b-27: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:15a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la @15a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:15a-2: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:15a-3: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:15a-5: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-008:15a-6: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phabs /
